Default Section & it's Properties

Default Section

This is a default Section.

  • Height : By default the Section takes the height of the content placed inside it.
  • Width : Default Width of the section is set to 100vw.
  • Background : Set a Solid Color, Image, Video or a Slideshow.
  • Padding : Global default Padding for Sections is set to 2rems(left, right) and 6rems(Top, Bottom). Change the Section Padding by adding a custom class to the Section.

Full Height Section

Section Height

This Section Height is set to 100vh.

  • Height : Section height can be set to take the content height or other values supported in the height classes such as the full viewport height, 50% of the viewport height or in pixels and other supported values.

Split Section

Sections with custom Width

To create Split Sections add a width class to the Section element and float them to Left or Right.
